YML.readLayout(filename)[source]

Read YML file containing layout for window.

Parameters

filename¶ – name of YML file

Return type

dict

YML.readParameters(filenames)[source]

Read file containing information about parameters

Parameters

filenames¶ – name(s) of file(s) containing information

Return type

Dict[str, Quantity]

Returns

Dictionary of parameter quantities. Key is name of parameter. Value is Quantity containg value and unit.
